description.narrative: The project aims help to build the Promote community resilience, social cohesion for deplaced persons ans host communitycohesion

sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

Targets de 2020 car le projet a été cloturé en 2020
1. 80% of GBV cases managed
2. a) 500 female having access to legal aid, b) 800 male having access to legal aid, c) 100 persons having access to legal aid
3. 2 of gender-balance conflict resolution and dialogue groups;
4. a) 500-Displaced community having access to economic opportunities b) 500 Displacement affected community having access to economic opportunities;
5. a)100% Displaced community having access to social basic services, dis-aggregated by groups
b) 100% Displacement affected community having access to social basic services, dis-aggregated by groups
6 .60% of persons having access to clean and renewable energy, dis aggregated by

1 0% survivres of GBV cases have had managed
2. a ) 198 female have had access to legal aid, b) 282 male have had access to legal aid
c) 480 persons having access to legal aid
3 . 28 leaders gender-balance conflict resolution and dialogue groups
4 a) 540 Displaced community have had access to economic opportunitie
b) 100 Displacement affected community have had access to economic opportunitie
c) 640 of persons have had access to economic opportunities Results de 2020 5. a) 84% Displaced community have had access to social basic services, dis-aggregated by groups b) 16 % Displacement affected community have had access to social basic services, dis-aggregated by group
6. 84% of persons have had access to clean and renewable energy, dis-aggregated by sex( 42% female of displaced community)
